facts.text: Roman Emperor Caracalla is assassinated (and succeeded) by his Praetorian Guard prefect, Marcus Opellius Macrinus.
The new Winchester Cathedral is dedicated by Walkelin.
Roger II of Sicily is excommunicated.
Pope Eugene III takes refuge in the castle of Ptolemy II of Tusculum.
Alexius III Angelus drives out brother Isaak II as Byzantine emperor
In Syria, sultan Baybars conquers the Krak of Chevaliers (a fortress near Homs).
Bartolomeo Prignano elected as Pope Urban VI
Alfonso de Borgia elected as Pope Callistus III
Battle at Novara: King Louis XII beats duke Ludovico Sforza
1st Jewish congregation in US forms synagogue, "Shearith Israel, NYC"
British troops chase French out of Masulipatam India
1st fire escape patented, wicker basket on a pulley & chain
